warning: Increased bleeding risk. Avoid concurrent use.
May increase warfarin effect. Monitor INR.
Increases theophylline levels. Risk of toxicity.
Risk of lactic acidosis. Stop metformin before CT scan.
Reduced antihypertensive effect. Monitor BP and kidney function.
May mask hypoglycemia symptoms. Monitor glucose carefully.
May reduce contraceptive efficacy. Use backup method.
